message:
SYSTEM: GATE(v3-ele_and).pdf: Página 24
Left Hand Side Patterns
• JAPE rules can access annotation features
• Features can be compared with ==, !=, 
>,<, =~, !~, ==~ and !=~
• Ranges can be specified({Token})[1,3] or 
({Token})[3]
• Contextual information can be specified in 
the same way, but has no label
• Contextual information will be consumed 
by the rule
({Annotation1})
({Annotation2}):match
({Annotation3})
JAPE RULES
({Token.kind == word})*
{Token.string == "@"}
({Token.kind == word})*
({Token.string == "."}
({Token.kind == word}) 
:email
speaker: SYSTEM
